result.title: BACS Regional Programming Camps 2017 Selection Contest
result.content:
Hello everyone!

We are glad to announce to you that tomorrow BACS Regional Programming Camps 2017 Selection Contest will be held on toph.

Contest will start 3 pm bangladesh time. There will be a online mirror contest also running parallelly with the contest and everyone is welcome to come and participate along with official contestants. Link to online mirror will be available on the site and also posted here tomorrow.

There will be six problems to solve in five hours and all of them have subtasks in them and the contest will be held in ioi style. This will be really helpful to ioi contestants we can say.

Lastly we say good luck to everyone. Official contestants reminding you again that cheating will get you permanent ban. And remember Judgesâ€™ decisions will be final, so dont cheat but be honest and play fair.

Contest will be added to codeforces gym after contest ends.

Contest has ended Update We are sorry for the problems faced during the contest, hopefully it didn't affect the contest that much.

Top 5 Participants:

1) sahedsohel

2) fsshakkhor

3) Alpha_Q

4) shadowfax

5) Matrix.code
